title: Approval UX Design System

detailed_design.description: Create shared approval flow design system: approve/reject/undo pattern. Applies to Sentinel file review (PBI-022) and Human-in-the-Loop automation flows. Single design system for consistency.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Design ApprovalCard, ApproveRejectButtons, UndoToast components. 2. Document keyboard shortcuts, swipe gestures. 3. Implement in Sentinel Review Queue (PBI-022). 4. Reuse for HITL automation pop-ups.

acceptance_criteria: Used by Sentinel Review Queue UI

user_stories.story: As a user, I want consistent approval flows across file review and automation.
As a user, I want to undo accidental approvals.

technical_notes.current_issue: No shared approval UX; PBI-022 and HITL would build separately
